channel.title: [REQ]Rapid Spacebar Clicker
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone here could make a program by if you press a F(1/12, preferable #10) button, it rapidly "clicks/press" spacebar
Im requesting this basicly for picking up loots for a game, wich requires spacebar to pick it up.. But it drops more items then i press spacebar so i need one :P
Its like an autoclicker, but instead, an auto-spacebar
Oh and, if this is the wrong forum, my bad...Thought this would suit the most ;D

item.title: [REQ]Rapid Spacebar Clicker
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

[quote=“ivan283, post:17, topic:3454”]hey guys,i know this topic is from 4-5 years already but,i tested the auto spacebar clicker wich Galok posted,it really works,but can you tell me which number to change so it can be faster?
thanks in advance[/quote]

Wait(10);
Wait(50);

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Rapid Spacebar Clicker
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“ivan283, post:17, topic:3454”]hey guys,i know this topic is from 4-5 years already but,i tested the auto spacebar clicker wich Galok posted,it really works,but can you tell me which number to change so it can be faster?
thanks in advance[/quote]

The statement:
Wait(50);
Causes it to wait for 50 milliseconds, so you can change it to a lower value if you like.

item.title: [REQ]Rapid Spacebar Clicker
item.dc:creator: @Galook Galook
item.description:
@Galook wrote:

here is the code in SCAR:

program New;
var
    Spacebar : Byte;
    
procedure checkForKeyDown();
begin
    while(isFKeyDown(10)) do
    begin
        KeyDown(Spacebar);
        KeyUp(Spacebar);
        Wait(10);
    end;
end;

begin
Spacebar := GetKeyCode(' ');
while(TRUE) do
    begin
        checkForKeyDown();
        Wait(50);
    end;
end.

You can change the wait times if you want, right now it checks 20 times a second whether or not the F10 key is down, and if it is, every 10 milliseconds the program ‘presses’ the spacebar

edit: me and mopar posted almost exact same time

btw, almost exact is in between 3 minutes…

btw #2, my first SCAR script(excluding hello world) <3

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Rapid Spacebar Clicker
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

get SCAR at www.dylock.net/scar

then put this in it:

program clickspace;

begin
repeat 
sendkeys(chr(13));
until(false)
end.

when you click start it will press the space bar faster than ever

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Rapid Spacebar Clicker
item.dc:creator: @Galook Galook
item.description:
@Galook wrote:

it wouldnt be as effective as what he wants though, with Java you can’t receive any keyPressed events that dont happen in a part of your GUI, so it wouldn’t work as well as one with SCAR. With SCAR you could do it and make it happen only while he holds the key

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ]Rapid Spacebar Clicker
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x

@1337h4x wrote:

hmm… just make a new java class with main and init put

while(true) { try{ Robot r = new Robot(); r.keyPress(10); r.keyRelease(10); }catch{ Exception (e){System.out.println(e);} }
Something like that…too lazy to test it out though sry.

EDIT: You need to import robot, and I think I wrote the try cathc block wrong. I hate exceptions.
